Free inspection within one working day, written fixed-price quote and discreet handling.

household.title: Household Clearance Vienna
household.subtitle: Complete clearance of apartment and house contents, fixed-price guarantee, value adjustment and broom-clean handover.
household.description: Complete clearance of apartments and houses. Disposal, recycling and fair purchase of valuables.
household.metaDescription: Household clearance Vienna – professional household clearance. Free quote for household clearance in Vienna and all of Austria.
household.body1: We handle the complete household clearance from A to Z: from inventory to clearance and proper disposal. Valuables are fairly assessed and purchased.
household.body2: Whether estate, move or dissolution – we work discreetly, quickly and at fixed prices. All 23 Vienna districts and all of Austria.
household.bullet1: Free on-site inspection and written fixed-price quote
household.bullet2: Maximum value adjustment for antiques and furniture
household.valueIntro: Clearing a household is often emotionally and logistically demanding. From the first visit to broom-clean handover we take care of everything and turn your project into a clear, manageable task.
household.sameDayBody: When capacity and access allow, we carry out household clearances on the same day. A quick photo check via WhatsApp is enough for an initial cost estimate. After the on-site inspection we confirm the fixed price.
household.sameDayCta: Request a free quote or contact us via WhatsApp at +43 660 4706098.
household.valueExplain: With value adjustment the fixed price stays predictable and is often lower, because reusable items are deducted directly from the price.
household.overviewLinkText: For a comprehensive overview of costs, procedures and bureaucracy we recommend our guide
household.overviewLinkSuffix: – there you will find tables, checklists and district info for all regions.
household.valueEqualBody: Our experts assess your antiques, designer furniture or collections directly on site. The purchase value is deducted from the fixed price immediately. This makes your household clearance significantly cheaper or even free.
household.eco1: Material separation and handover to certified partners (MA 48, recycling centres)
household.eco2: Photo report and written confirmation for property management or notary
household.advantagesVs: Advantages over DIY and cheap providers: no hidden costs, full liability insurance and a team that clears flats in Vienna every day.
household.related1Desc: Classic apartment clearance with fixed price and handover guarantee.
household.related2Desc: Discreet handling in case of death.
household.related4Desc: Quickly free up space in ancillary rooms.
household.what5: Bulky waste and hazardous waste (e.g. paints)
household.processStep1Desc: Assessment of space, effort and reusable items directly at your location.
household.processStep2Desc: You receive a written quote in which the value of your items is deducted from the price.
household.processStep3Desc: Our team clears quickly, protects floors and walls and separates materials professionally.
household.processStep4Desc: Final cleaning, handover report and key handover according to your specifications.
household.faq1Q: What does a household clearance cost?
household.faq1A: Price depends on district, access and volume. After the on-site inspection you receive a fixed-price quote; the value of valuable items is deducted.
household.faq2A: In Vienna appointments are usually possible within 3–5 working days. Express options available on request.
household.faq3Q: Do you also clear cellars and ancillary rooms?
household.faq3A: Yes, all ancillary rooms, cellar compartments and attics are included in the quote.

entrumpelungWien.title: Clearance Vienna (Entrümpelung)
entrumpelungWien.subtitle: Clearance in Vienna with focus on value credit, sorting and reuse. Fixed price after inspection, WhatsApp check and MA 48 coordination.
entrumpelungWien.description: Value balance, sorting and sustainable disposal in Vienna.
entrumpelungWien.metaDescription: Clearance Vienna – value balance & sorting. Fixed price after inspection. Free quote.
entrumpelungWien.bullet2: Value credit for furniture, antiques, tech
entrumpelungWien.bullet3: Sorting, donation routes and reuse in focus
entrumpelungWien.bullet4: Fixed price after inspection, MA 48 and recycling centre coordination
entrumpelungWien.introTitle: Clearance Vienna with fixed price & maximum value balance
entrumpelungWien.intro: Clearance in Vienna means for us: sort, reuse, dispose. We combine value assessment, donation routes and transparent disposal in a fixed price. WhatsApp photos (start chat) are enough for an initial assessment; on site we clarify access, donation options, recycling centre slots and MA 48. We serve all 23 Vienna districts – travel, no-parking zones and value credit are planned into the process.
entrumpelungWien.districts: We are active in all 23 districts and also take on clearances in the Vienna area and Lower Austria. An overview of locations can be found under Districts and in the Lower Austria section. If you are looking for a clearance nearby, just give us the district or place and we will confirm the next free slot.
entrumpelungWien.whyTitle: Why clearance Vienna with Rümpel Räumung?
entrumpelungWien.why1: Value credit first: We assess antiques, furniture, collections and tech transparently.
entrumpelungWien.why2: Donations and reuse: 48er-Tandler boxes, social partners and passing on reduce disposal costs.
entrumpelungWien.why3: Fine sorting instead of bulk disposal: books, textiles, electrical, wood, metal – each fraction goes the right way.
entrumpelungWien.why4: Fixed price after inspection: includes sorting, disposal, documentation and proof for property management.
entrumpelungWien.services1: Household clearances, partial clearances and collection clearances
entrumpelungWien.services2: Cellar, attic and archive clearance with careful sorting
entrumpelungWien.services3: Reuse via donation points or purchase partners where useful
entrumpelungWien.services4: Recycling centre and MA 48 coordination including transport logistics
entrumpelungWien.pricesIntro: Value credit noticeably reduces the fixed price. So a clearance in Vienna often stays affordable without cutting quality.
entrumpelungWien.pricesRichtwerte: Guidelines help with assessment. The more that can be reused, the lower the fixed price:
entrumpelungWien.price1: Room: from 150 € – usually low effort, quick photo check
entrumpelungWien.price2: 2–3 room apartment: 250–500 € – common value items: furniture, tech, décor
entrumpelungWien.price3: Large apartment: 400–800 € – more rooms, often cellar/compartments included
entrumpelungWien.price4: Single-family house: 600–1200 € – garden, garage, outbuildings possible
entrumpelungWien.pricesNote: Note: Final price after inspection with stated value credit and donation options.
entrumpelungWien.express: When slots are free we start in Vienna the same day. A short photo check via WhatsApp is enough for an initial assessment. We confirm the fixed price after the on-site inspection. Express appointments are especially suitable when handovers are short notice or a quick move-out is needed.
entrumpelungWien.expressCta: Request free quote or contact via WhatsApp +43 660 4706098.
entrumpelungWien.processStep1Desc: Initial assessment by phone or WhatsApp.
entrumpelungWien.processStep2Desc: List of valuable items, donation options and fixed price.
entrumpelungWien.processStep4Desc: Documentation, photos and proof for property management or landlord.
entrumpelungWien.processCta: Quick start? Request free quote or write via WhatsApp +43 660 4706098 – we reply as long as the phone is online.
entrumpelungWien.wohnungsLink: If the focus is on a full apartment clearance, you will find the right process, fixed-price details and handover checklists on our Apartment clearance Vienna page.
entrumpelungWien.generalLink: A general overview without location reference can be found on the Clearance page.
entrumpelungWien.sustainability1: 48er-Tandler boxes and social partners for reusable items
entrumpelungWien.sustainability2: Recycling centre slots, separation of electrical, wood, metal, paper
entrumpelungWien.sustainability3: Optional transport to purchase partners for high-value items
entrumpelungWien.sustainability4: Photo protocol and clear list of what was reused or donated
entrumpelungWien.sustainabilityLink: More details on municipal collection in our guide Bulky waste collection Vienna.
entrumpelungWien.what1: Apartment and household clearances with on-site sorting
entrumpelungWien.what2: Cellar and attic clearances including value credit
entrumpelungWien.what3: Partial clearances for rooms, archives or collections
entrumpelungWien.ctaSubline: We will get back to you within one working day with an appointment suggestion.
entrumpelungWien.yourStep1Desc: By phone, photo or video we clarify scope, valuable items and desired deadlines.
entrumpelungWien.yourStep2Desc: We list reusable items, check donation options and calculate the fixed price with value credit.
entrumpelungWien.yourStep3Desc: Separation into reusable, donations, recycling. Protective materials and careful logistics for period buildings, attic or cellar.
entrumpelungWien.yourStep4Desc: Photo protocol, proof for property management and transparent breakdown of value credit.
entrumpelungWien.faq1Q: What does a clearance in Vienna cost?
entrumpelungWien.faq1A: After the inspection you receive a fixed price including stated value credit. The more that can be reused, the lower the total price.
entrumpelungWien.faq2Q: How quickly can appointments be made?
entrumpelungWien.faq2A: In Vienna usually within 2–5 working days, express subject to availability. We apply for no-parking zones in parallel.
entrumpelungWien.faq3Q: Do you also coordinate MA 48 and special waste?
entrumpelungWien.faq3A: Yes. We book recycling centre slots, use 48er-Tandler boxes and organise containers for special fractions when needed.

entrumpelungWien.related3Desc: Second-hand and collections only with clearance.

raeumungWien.scope1: Complete emptying of apartments, houses and ancillary rooms
raeumungWien.scope2: Dismantling of kitchens, shelving, fitted units and floor coverings

raeumungWien.evictionCta: Quick start? Request clearance Vienna or WhatsApp +43 660 4706098 – we reply as long as the phone is online.

raeumungWien.permits2: Container logistics incl. placement permits and access planning.
raeumungWien.permits3: Protection for stairwells, lifts and floors, lift bookings for large properties.

raeumungWien.commercial2: Clearance of server rooms, archives and storage areas with documentation

raeumungWien.commercial4: Cooperation with facility management and security services
raeumungWien.guidelines1: 2–3 room apartment: usually 1 day, incl. dismantling of small fitted units
raeumungWien.guidelines2: Large apartment or single-family house: 1–2 days, often with container and no-parking zone
raeumungWien.guidelines3: Office or storage up to approx. 200 m²: 1–2 days, dismantling as required

For classic apartment clearances you will find all details on Apartment clearance Vienna.
raeumungWien.generalLink: A general overview without location reference can be found on the Clearance page.
raeumungWien.expressSlots: For handover pressure or water damage we check express slots, secure no-parking zones in parallel and usually start within 24–48 hours of inspection. Weekend or evening appointments are possible.

raeumungWien.contactNote: In your first contact, briefly state property type, deadline and whether dismantling/containers are needed – then we will provide a date and logistics proposal immediately.
raeumungWien.what1: Complete apartment and house clearances incl. ancillary rooms
raeumungWien.what2: Dismantling of kitchens, fitted units, shelving and floor coverings

raeumungWien.what4: Commercial space: offices, storage, workshops and retail
raeumungWien.what5: Bulky waste, construction and special waste with MA 48 coordination
raeumungWien.what6: Handover protocol with photos for landlords or property management
raeumungWien.ctaSubline: We will get back to you within one working day with an appointment suggestion.
raeumungWien.yourStep1Desc: By phone or WhatsApp we clarify scope, access, key handover and target date.
raeumungWien.yourStep2Desc: On site we check dismantling, container spaces, lift dimensions and house rules. You receive a written quote.
raeumungWien.yourStep3Desc: Project plan with team size, protective materials, no-parking zones and MA 48. We also clear commercial space outside business hours.
raeumungWien.yourStep4Desc: Handover protocol with photos, optional for property management or facility management. Documentation of dismantling included.
raeumungWien.faq1Q: What does a clearance in Vienna cost?
raeumungWien.faq1A: Costs depend on area, accessibility and volume. After the free inspection you receive a fixed price with stated value credit.
raeumungWien.faq2Q: How quickly can you carry out a clearance?
raeumungWien.faq2A: In Vienna appointments are usually possible within 2–5 working days. We check express slots daily.
raeumungWien.faq3Q: Do you clear in all Vienna districts?
raeumungWien.faq3A: Yes, we are active in all 23 Vienna districts and know local specifics and disposal points.
raeumungWien.faq4Q: Is MA 48 an alternative to a clearance company?
raeumungWien.faq4A: MA 48 disposes of bulky waste at the recycling centre or from the kerb but does not carry out full apartment clearances. We combine appointment booking, carrying and value credit; see our guide „MA 48 or clearance company?“ for more details.
raeumungWien.faq5Q: Can I request a clearance via WhatsApp?
raeumungWien.faq5A: Yes, photos or videos are enough for an initial assessment. Send us a WhatsApp message or call – you will receive an appointment suggestion shortly.
raeumungWien.related1Desc: For classic apartment clearances with value credit.
raeumungWien.related2Desc: When value balance is the priority.

zimmerRaeumung.introTitle: Room Clearance Vienna: Flexible for students & professionals
zimmerRaeumung.intro: As part of our Räumung Wien services we specialise in fast room clearances in all Vienna districts. Room clearance is one of our most frequent services – whether shared-flat clearance, change of studies, job change or move to a new city. A room often contains personal items that need sorting, and time pressure is usually high. We understand this challenge and offer fast, discreet solutions.
zimmerRaeumung.searchTitle: How we serve search queries like „Room clearance Vienna“
zimmerRaeumung.search1: „zimmer räumung wien“ / „wien zimmer räumung“ – Express slots for shared-flat clearances, including no-parking zones in the city centre.
zimmerRaeumung.search2: „zimmer räumung ma 48“ – We carry everything from the top floor to the kerb and organise MA 48 appointments or private containers when needed.
zimmerRaeumung.search3: „zimmer räumung wertausgleich“ – Furniture, tech or designer items are credited so the clearance is cheaper or free.
zimmerRaeumung.searchCta: Quickstart: Send us the key photos via WhatsApp – we often confirm the fixed price the same day.

zimmerRaeumung.student1: Shared-flat clearances with sensitive coordination between several tenants
zimmerRaeumung.student2: End-of-semester clearances at peak times in July and January
zimmerRaeumung.student3: Study abroad with short notice periods

prices.title: Prices
prices.subtitle: Transparent pricing and value adjustment
prices.intro: Fairness and transparency are our top priorities. Instead of unclear hourly rates, you receive a written quote with a guaranteed fixed price after the free on-site inspection.
prices.howTitle: How we calculate your fixed price
prices.step1: Free on-site inspection – we assess scope, accessibility and special requirements.
prices.step2: Value adjustment – usable items are purchased fairly and the purchase price is deducted directly.
prices.step3: Fixed-price quote – the final amount includes all services and discounts.
prices.example1: Clearance cost: €800 – deduction for valuable items: €150 → You pay €650.
prices.example2: Clearance cost: €1,200 – value credit: €1,500 → You pay €0 and receive €300.
prices.examplesNote: The higher the value of your items, the lower the invoice total. This often makes clearance significantly cheaper or even free.
prices.freeTitle: Free clearance thanks to value-based adjustment?
prices.freeBody: If the value of your items exceeds the clearance cost, free household clearance is indeed possible. In practice this applies especially to designer furniture, antiques, machinery or collectables. Even without such items, the final price can be reduced – e.g. through deductions for valuables, MA 48 bulky waste collection and donations.
prices.ma48Title: MA 48 or full service? How to compare correctly
prices.ma48Point1: MA 48 waste sites: Ideal for individual bulky items – book an appointment, organise transport. Step-by-step instructions in the MA 48 waste site checklist.
prices.ma48Point2: Value adjustment and purchase: As soon as there is purchase potential, our fixed price is reduced immediately. Use WhatsApp for the inventory list – we will give you an initial assessment before we start.
prices.expressTitle: Express and regional surcharges at a glance
prices.expressBody: For urgent appointments (e.g. next-day collection, water damage, clearance) we charge a small express surcharge. Details can be found in the guide „Quick clearance Vienna – tips for express clearance“.

locations.intro: Vienna remains our main hub; planning possible across Austria. Over 80% of our operations are in Vienna – so our teams, depots and parking materials are based there. For customers with properties in Lower Austria, Burgenland, Styria, Carinthia, Upper Austria or Salzburg, the same professionals are coordinated – no need to find new providers. Select your federal state, view the region pages and request a custom fixed-price quote.
locations.introVienna: For fixed-price household clearance in Vienna, our services page takes you straight to prices, process and contact.
locations.selectLocationSub: First Vienna, then Lower Austria, Burgenland, Styria, Carinthia, Upper Austria and Salzburg – in each state you will find district and region pages.
locations.mostSearchedDesc: These pages cover search queries like "Clearance Vienna 1180" or "Apartment clearance Vienna 1210" and get you to the right quote without detours.

stateIntros.wien: 23 districts, short travel distances and well-coordinated teams – we handle the vast majority of parking permits here.
stateIntros.niederoesterreich: Clearances in the Vienna suburbs, Vienna Woods and district towns like Baden, Mödling or St. Pölten.
stateIntros.burgenland: Clearances between Eisenstadt, Lake Neusiedl and southern Burgenland – including weekend homes and wineries.
stateIntros.steiermark: Clearances in Graz, Leoben and southern Styria – fixed price, value adjustment and short-notice appointments.
stateIntros.kaernten: Clearances in Klagenfurt, Villach and around Wörthersee, Lake Ossiach or Lake Millstatt – fixed price, value adjustment, discreet teams.
stateIntros.oberoesterreich: Clearances in Linz, Wels, Steyr and the Salzkammergut – fixed price, value adjustment and coordinated container logistics.
stateIntros.salzburg: Clearances in Salzburg city, Flachgau and Alpine regions – fixed price, value adjustment and coordinated planning.

locations.detailBody: Clearance and household clearance in {region}. Fixed price, value adjustment and free inspection. One contact from first enquiry to key handover.

locationWienState.heroSub: 23 districts, short travel distances and well-coordinated teams – we handle the majority of all clearances here.
locationWienState.section1Body: Over 80% of our clearance operations in Vienna take place in the city. That is why teams, special tools and no-parking materials are always ready. The district pages give you a first impression of prices, specifics and frequently asked questions. For complex clearances – attics, large period buildings or hoarder flats – we inspect within one working day and provide a fixed price including value allowance. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase. This service is an integral part of our offer and helps you reduce costs while we give valuable items a new life.
locationWienState.section2Body:
Inner districts (1st–9th) require special logistics: no-parking zones must be registered 72 hours in advance, stairwells are often too narrow for large furniture, and neighbours are directly affected. We plan loading times precisely, liaise with property management in advance and ensure quiet transport via stairs. We have years of experience with complex household clearances in period flats.

Outer districts (10th–23rd) offer more flexibility: car access, container spaces and more storage options. In districts like Floridsdorf, Liesing or Donaustadt, single-family and terraced houses are more common – here we can often drive directly to the property.
locationWienState.section3Body:
MA 48 is responsible for waste disposal, but for larger clearances we work directly with certified disposal companies. For no-parking zones we organise all necessary permits: application, erection and collection of signs. Costs vary by zone and duration.

For period buildings we often coordinate with property management – especially for data reduction (GDPR-compliant document destruction) in offices or practice premises. We know Vienna house rules standards and adhere to them strictly.
locationWienState.section4Body:
Our depots in Döbling and Liesing enable fast travel to all districts. Inner-city projects take 4–8 hours depending on size, larger apartment clearances a full day. In Neustadt and the city centre vehicles can only park at certain times – we factor this into planning.

Parking situation: Advance registration is essential especially in the 1st, 6th, 7th and 8th districts. In new-build areas like Seestadt Aspern or near Donau City there is better access.
locationWienState.section5Body:
Vienna clearances benefit from short travel distances and well-coordinated teams. This has a positive effect on costs. Antiques from period flats are particularly valuable – we know the collector scene at Naschmarkt, flea markets and galleries.

For hoarder flats in Vienna we work closely with psychosocial services when requested. MA 48 supports in special hardship cases – we know the contacts and can help with applications. For hoarder clearances we use discreet unmarked teams.

For office and business clearances in the 1st district or city locations we coordinate closely with facility managers and have experience with business closures in high-rise floors.
locationWienState.districtsIntro: Here you will find every Vienna district page with process, prices and FAQ.
locationWienState.benefit1Desc: We plan no-parking zones, stairwells and loading times daily – including authority procedures.
locationWienState.benefit2Desc: Thanks to teams in all districts we often start within 48 hours.
locationWienState.benefit3Desc: Antiques, technology and collections are credited directly against the quote.

locationWien1170.heroSub: Clearance work in Hernals – between Elterleinplatz and Dornbach: suburban villas, municipal housing and commercial premises.
locationWien1170.heroPoint1: Professional clearance of slopes and gardens.
locationWien1170.heroPoint2: Experience with old villas, studios and small commercial properties.
locationWien1170.heroPoint3: Close coordination with churches, associations and property management.
locationWien1170.heroPoint4: Logistics along busy Hernalser Hauptstraße and in quiet residential areas.
locationWien1170.section1Title: Household clearance in Hernals: Between city life and wine tavern culture
locationWien1170.section1Body: The 17th district Hernals has two faces: on the one hand the lively city life around Hernalser Hauptstraße and Elterleinplatz, on the other the pastoral, almost village-like atmosphere in the vineyards of Dornbach and Neuwaldegg. This mix makes every household clearance a unique challenge. As part of our cleaning and clearance services we only assess the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand items – we do not purchase them separately.
locationWien1170.section2Body: The topography in Hernals is demanding. Steep slopes in the cottage settlements and in Neuwaldegg plus narrow streets require careful planning and suitable equipment. Our teams are experienced in working on slopes and secure access routes and gardens professionally to avoid damage. In the densely built inner areas we set up no-parking zones so as not to disrupt traffic flow and to ensure effective clearance.
locationWien1170.section3Body: One of the biggest logistical advantages in Hernals is the MA48 waste collection point at Richthausenstraße 2. This central location allows bulky waste and other recyclables to be disposed of quickly, cost-effectively and in an eco-friendly way right in the district. This avoids long transport routes and protects the environment. For well-preserved items, the MA48 second-hand box on site offers a sustainable reuse option.
locationWien1170.section4Title: From Biedermeier flat to wine tavern villa
locationWien1170.section4Body: The architecture in Hernals is as diverse as the district itself. From classic Biedermeier apartments and large municipal housing blocks to spacious wine tavern villas, every property has its own character and requires an individual approach. When clearing historic buildings we attach the greatest importance to preserving the fabric of the building. For houses in the wine tavern areas we ensure the proper disposal of agricultural equipment and old wine barrels. For studios or storage facilities we always exercise due care, respect our customers' property and understand the particularities of this attractive district.
locationWien1170.whatPoint1: Family homes and villas in Dornbach and Neuwaldegg.
locationWien1170.whatPoint2: Gründerzeit buildings and municipal housing around Elterleinplatz.
locationWien1170.whatPoint3: Studios, warehouses and ateliers along Hernalser Hauptstraße.
locationWien1170.whatPoint4: Apartments in cottage settlements with sensitive building fabric.
locationWien1170.step1Desc: We plan access routes, secure slopes and arrange container spaces if required.
locationWien1170.step2Desc: Antique furniture, artworks and valuable collections are assessed and valued by our experts.
locationWien1170.step3Desc: We work in parallel and clear interiors, basements, attics and gardens in one go.
locationWien1170.step4Desc: You receive a detailed report with photos and, if desired, recommendations for painters, upholsterers or estate agents.
locationWien1170.faq1Q: Do you also clear club premises or church properties?
locationWien1170.faq1A: Yes, we have experience with clearing club premises and church properties as well as the professional destruction of archives and special waste.
locationWien1170.faq2Q: The access to our house in Neuwaldegg is very steep. Is that a problem?
locationWien1170.faq2A: No, we specialise in such requirements and use special vehicles and securing techniques when needed.
locationWien1170.faq3Q: What happens to the old wine barrels in my grandfather's cellar?
locationWien1170.faq3A: We assess condition and value. There are often enthusiasts interested in such items – we will of course pass on any proceeds to you.

locationWien1180.heroSub: Clearance in Währing: Cottage district, Eduardgasse and near BOKU – student residences, villas and sensitive properties. Fixed price, value adjustment and broom-clean handover.
locationWien1180.heroPoint1: Villas and period buildings in the Cottage district – we proceed with the utmost care.
locationWien1180.heroPoint2: Experience with libraries, musical instruments and art collections.
locationWien1180.heroPoint3: Fixed-price quotes for student flats and loft conversion projects.
locationWien1180.heroPoint4: Absolute discretion when clearing embassy residences and offices.
locationWien1180.section1Title: Clearance in Vienna 1180 – Elegance requires sensitivity
locationWien1180.section1Body: The 18th district Währing is one of Vienna's most prestigious and greenest areas. The famous Cottage district, numerous embassy residences and proximity to Türkenschanzpark give the district a unique, elegant atmosphere. Our property cleaning and clearance in the 18th district combines the highest professionalism with discretion – ideal for private properties, student flats and embassy premises. As part of our cleaning or clearance services we only assess the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand items – we do not purchase them separately.
locationWien1180.section2Body: The magnificent villas and elegant apartment buildings in Währing are often architectural gems. Preserving the historic fabric of these buildings is our top priority. We use special protective materials – such as felt and film – to protect valuable parquet floors, stucco ceilings and elaborate ornamentation. Our teams are trained to work with extreme care even in narrow stairwells or winding gardens. In the quiet, tree-lined streets of the Cottage district a discreet approach is essential: we use unmarked vehicles and our staff always behave respectfully and quietly.
locationWien1180.section3Body: Währing has no MA48 waste collection point of its own. Careful planning of disposal routes is therefore particularly important. The two nearest and most accessible sites are the waste facility in Hernals (Richthausenstraße 2, 1170 Vienna) and that in Heiligenstadt (Grinzinger Straße 151, 1190 Vienna). Depending on the property location we choose the most efficient route to minimise time and costs.
locationWien1180.section4Body: Währing is not only an exclusive residential area but also an important academic hub – the University of Natural Resources and Life Sciences (BOKU) is based here. We have experience in clearing student accommodation and dismantling institute libraries and archives. The proximity to numerous diplomatic missions requires the highest sensitivity and compliance with the strictest data protection requirements. Whether an upmarket flat, embassy residence, school or institute building or fitting out a basement in a Biedermeier house – in the 18th district we are your discreet and reliable partner.
locationWien1180.whatPoint1: Cottage villas, embassy residences and family homes in Gersthof and Pötzleinsdorf.
locationWien1180.whatPoint2: Student flats and shared apartments along Währinger Straße and Gentzgasse.
locationWien1180.whatPoint3: School and institute buildings near Türkenschanzpark and BOKU.
locationWien1180.whatPoint4: Sensitive building fabric in historic apartment buildings.
locationWien1180.step1Desc: We protect valuable parquet floors, stucco ceilings and historic doors with professional materials such as felt and film.
locationWien1180.step2Desc: Antiques, grand pianos, designer furniture or entire collections are assessed by our experts and their value is factored into the cost calculation.
locationWien1180.step3Desc: For the safe transport of your most valuable and sensitive items we use climate-controlled boxes, special art crates and protective packaging.
locationWien1180.step4Desc: We guarantee a clean handover, carry out odour neutralisation if required and offer professional deep cleaning on request.
locationWien1180.faq1Q: Do you also handle the transport of valuable grand pianos or upright pianos?
locationWien1180.faq1A: Yes, we have experience with transporting heavy and sensitive musical instruments and use special carrying straps; we work with crane operators when needed.
locationWien1180.faq2Q: Can you sort and dispose of archives from schools or diplomatic missions?
locationWien1180.faq2A: Yes, we conduct archive inventories, digitise documents on request and ensure GDPR-compliant destruction.
locationWien1180.faq3Q: The access to our house in the Cottage district is very narrow. How do you handle that?
locationWien1180.faq3A: We know the local conditions and use agile, smaller vehicles. We also set up temporary no-parking zones when required.

locationWien1010.heroSub: Specialist teams for household clearances in the Inner City – including no-parking zones and value adjustment.
locationWien1010.section1Title: Household clearance in the heart of Vienna
locationWien1010.section1Body: A household clearance in the 1st district demands more than muscle. Between Stephansdom, Graben and Kärntner Straße every minute of loading time and every kilogram moved through narrow stairwells counts. Our Vienna City clearance teams work daily in the Inner City, know delivery windows, access restrictions and when MA 46 approves a no-parking zone. So that your palais, penthouse or period apartment stays intact, corner protection, lift mats, bubble wrap and dust barriers come as standard.
locationWien1010.section2Title: Support from site visit to key handover
locationWien1010.section2Body: We support owners, property managers and law firms from the first site visit to key handover. This includes dismantling kitchens or fitted units, separating hazardous waste and transparent value allowance for antiques, designer furniture, art and entire libraries. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase. For estates we connect you directly with our specialist estate service and arrange climate-controlled storage or sales via Viennese auction houses if required – including documentation for notaries and insurers.
locationWien1010.section3Title: How your household clearance 1010 Vienna works
locationWien1010.section3Body: Free inspection: We come within 24–48 hours, assess scope, valuables and special requirements on site. Fixed-price quote & value adjustment: You receive a written quote with guaranteed total price and credited value of reusable items. Clearance & logistics: On the agreed date the team arrives with suitable vehicles, protects stairwells and safely removes furniture, safes or IT hardware. Broom-clean handover: After clearance and recycling we hand over the property clean and document everything with photo or video protocol on request.
locationWien1010.section4Title: Why Ruempelraeumung.at in the Inner City?
locationWien1010.section4Body: Logistics without delay thanks to no-parking zones, city permits and e-transporters. Care in listed buildings with trained teams and special protection. Value analysis by certified partners – often significantly reduces total costs. Discreet handling with anonymised vehicles and NDAs at prominent addresses.
locationWien1010.section5Title: Disposal and recycling in the 1st district
locationWien1010.section5Body: Proper disposal is an important aspect of every household clearance. In the 1st district there are no MA48 waste facilities. That means all logistics for disposing of bulky waste and other materials must be carefully planned. We handle this planning for you and transport all materials to the nearest recycling centres in neighbouring districts. If time is short or you are coordinating from abroad, we provide a clear project plan, fixed contacts and regular updates.

locationWien1020.section1Title: Household clearance in Leopoldstadt: From period to new build
locationWien1020.section1Body: The 2nd district is a district of contrasts. Between the historic Augarten and the modern towers of Donau-City, worlds meet – and that is reflected in the apartments too. A household clearance in the Karmeliterviertel has different requirements than clearing an apartment in the new Nordbahnviertel. Our teams are very familiar with conditions in Leopoldstadt. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1020.section2Title: Logistics in the heart of the 2nd district
locationWien1020.section2Body: The narrow streets around Karmelitermarkt or Taborstraße require precise planning. Short-stay parking is the norm, free spaces the exception. So we arrange a temporary no-parking zone when needed so our vehicles can park right outside your door. In the quieter but often equally narrow residential streets of Stuwerviertel we use smaller vehicles and trolleys. For car-free zones in Nordbahnviertel we use eco-friendly cargo bikes.
locationWien1020.section3Body: Leopoldstadt has it all: from grand period buildings with high ceilings and sensitive floors to functional municipal housing from the 1950s. Every building has its quirks. In modern complexes near the Vienna University of Economics (WU) or Messe Wien we coordinate closely with property management to use lifts and loading zones efficiently. In period buildings on the Donaukanal we pay special attention to protecting stairwells and historic fabric. Whether a small flat with a view of the Prater, clearing a full cellar compartment or a large office – we have the right solution.
locationWien1020.section4Title: Disposal and recycling in the 2nd district
locationWien1020.section4Body: Proper disposal is an important aspect of every household clearance. In the 2nd district there is no MA48 waste facility. The nearest facility is in Percostraße in the 22nd district. We handle all logistics for you and transport all materials to the relevant recycling centres.

locationWien1020.step1Desc: We check courtyards, lifts and access to plan the best flow – whether in a period building near Augarten or a new build near WU.

locationWien1030.section1Title: Household clearance in Landstraße: Between diplomacy and dynamism
locationWien1030.section1Body: The 3rd district, Landstraße, is a place of variety. Here the elegant façades of the embassy quarter meet the bustle of Landstraßer Hauptstraße and the modern architecture of Neu Marx. This mix demands a high degree of flexibility and tact for household clearances. Whether it is the discreet clearance of a diplomat’s flat or the quick dissolution of a start-up office – we know the specific requirements of the district.
locationWien1030.section2Body: Landstraßer Hauptstraße, one of Vienna’s main traffic arteries, poses particular logistical hurdles. Loading zones are scarce and the high traffic density allows only short time windows for transport work. We get around this by setting up temporary no-parking zones and scheduling our operations for early morning or quieter traffic periods. In the narrow side streets around Rochusmarkt or in Fasanviertel we use agile, smaller vehicles to disturb residents as little as possible.
locationWien1030.section3Body: The architecture in the 3rd district is as varied as its residents. The grand Gründerzeit buildings near Belvedere or Rennweg often have no lifts. Our experienced teams are trained to move even heavy furniture safely through narrow, historic stairwells without damaging walls or railings. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase. By contrast, the modern residential and office towers such as Triiiple Towers or the buildings in Neu Marx require close coordination with property management to make best use of goods lifts and loading zones. We protect sensitive floors and high-quality surfaces with special coverings and always work cleanly and efficiently, whether it is a law firm dissolution, clearing storage rooms or clearing cellars and attics.
locationWien1030.section4Title: Disposal and recycling in the 3rd district
locationWien1030.section4Body: Proper disposal is an important aspect of every household clearance. In the 3rd district there is no MA48 waste facility. The nearest facility is in Simmering. We handle all logistics for you and transport all materials to the relevant recycling centres.

locationWien1040.section1Title: Household clearance in Wieden: Where charm meets logistics
locationWien1040.section1Body: The 4th district, Wieden, is a byword for urban living. Between the bustling Naschmarkt, the historic lanes of Freihausviertel and the proximity to Vienna University of Technology, a mix of tradition and modernity shapes the area. Household clearances in this district require particular care and logistical skill to match Wieden’s unique character. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1040.section2Title: Challenge: Narrow streets and high floors
locationWien1040.section2Body: Wieden is known for its charming but often very narrow streets, such as Schleifmühlgasse or Mühlgasse. Parking here is a daily challenge. To ensure a smooth household clearance we arrange a no-parking zone right outside the building when needed. Many of the grand period buildings in Wieden have no lift, which makes moving furniture from upper floors physically demanding. Our teams are specially trained to manoeuvre heavy and bulky items safely through narrow stairwells without damaging the historic fabric.
locationWien1040.section3Title: Where does bulky waste go in Wieden?
locationWien1040.section3Body: Proper disposal is an important aspect of every household clearance. The 4th district has no MA48 waste facility of its own. For Wieden residents the nearest site is the facility in Favoriten (Eva-Zilcher-Gasse 3, 1100 Vienna). An eco-friendly option for well-preserved furniture and items is the 48er-Tandler in the neighbouring 5th district at Siebenbrunnenfeldgasse 3, where reusable items can be handed in, saving resources and reducing waste.
locationWien1040.section4Title: From student flat to period apartment
locationWien1040.section4Body: Proximity to TU Wien means a high density of student flats and co-living spaces, especially around Theresianum. These often need to be cleared quickly and efficiently for the next tenant. At the same time Wieden is home to exclusive penthouse flats with sensitive designer furniture and valuable art. We treat every property with the care and discretion it deserves. Whether a small student flat, an agency office in a former factory floor or clearing cellars and storage rooms – we adapt our approach to our customers’ needs and ensure a stress-free process.

locationWien1050.section1Title: Household clearance in Margareten: Efficiency in tight spaces
locationWien1050.section1Body: Margareten, the 5th district, is one of Vienna’s most densely populated districts. Shaped by historic workers’ housing – the so-called „Gemeindebauten“ – and charming Gründerzeit buildings, every household clearance here is a particular logistical challenge. The narrow streets and high population density require precise planning and considerate conduct. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1050.section2Title: Logistics in the heart of the 5th district
locationWien1050.section2Body: Parking in Margareten is notoriously tight. To ensure a smooth process we arrange no-parking zones. Many buildings have narrow courtyards and winding stairwells without lifts. Our teams are specialised in working efficiently even under these conditions. With agile vehicles and special carrying equipment we master even the tightest access and stairs.
locationWien1050.section3Body: A special feature in the 5th district is the 48er-Tandler at Siebenbrunnenfeldgasse 3. Here well-preserved furniture, clothing and other everyday items can be handed in and find new owners. This re-use principle is not only sustainable but often the quickest and simplest solution for still usable items. For disposal of bulky waste and other non-reusable materials, Margareten residents must use neighbouring districts, as there is no MA48 facility in the district. The nearest site is the facility in Favoriten (Eva-Zilcher-Gasse 3, 1100 Vienna).
locationWien1050.section4Body: Margareten has developed into a lively creative hub in recent years. Alongside traditional flats there are numerous studios, small workshops and design offices. When clearing such creative spaces we pay special attention to careful handling of sensitive materials and equipment. Whether a classic flat in the Matzleinsdorfer Hochhaus, clearing cellars and attics, a shop in Reinprechtsdorfer Straße or an artist’s studio at Schlossquadrat – we have the right solution for every requirement and ensure a fast, professional clearance.

For Alsergrund residents the nearest sites are the facility in Heiligenstadt (Grinzinger Straße 151, 1190 Vienna) and the facility in Hernals (Richthausenstraße 2, 1170 Vienna). An excellent alternative for reusing well-preserved items is the 48er-Tandler in the 5th district, which helps reduce waste and preserve valuable resources.
locationWien1090.section4Body: The clientele in the 9th district is as varied as it is demanding. When clearing medical practices or laboratories we guarantee proper, certified disposal of medical material and GDPR-compliant destruction of sensitive patient data. For clearing law firms or professors’ households we offer a special service for large libraries: from cataloguing and donation to academic institutions to fair value allowance for valuable collections. We work discreetly, quickly and with the respect due to our customers’ intellectual and material heritage, whether cellars or attics.

locationWien1100.section1Title: Household clearance in Favoriten: Where size meets efficiency
locationWien1100.section1Body: Favoriten, the 10th district, is Vienna’s most populous district and a melting pot of cultures. From the huge municipal housing estates via single-family settlements on Laaer Berg to the modern high-rises of Wienerberg City – the variety of housing is enormous. Household clearances in this district require above all one thing: efficient, scalable logistics. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1100.section2Body: Nowhere in Vienna are there as many large housing estates as in Favoriten. We are experts in the special challenges they bring. Whether a flat in the Per-Albin-Hansson-Siedlung or in one of the many municipal buildings around Reumannplatz – we know the routes, the rules and the contacts. We work closely with Wiener Wohnen and other property managers to ensure a smooth, neighbour-friendly clearance. With large teams and optimised workflows we can often hand over even extensive flats broom-clean in a single day.
locationWien1100.section3Title: Short distances: The waste facility right in the district
locationWien1100.section3Body: A major advantage in Favoriten is the local infrastructure. With the MA48 facility at Eva-Zilcher-Gasse 3 the district has its own central drop-off point for proper disposal of bulky waste, electrical items and hazardous materials. This saves not only time but also transport costs, reflected in our fair prices. At all facilities there is the option to hand in still usable items at the 48er-Tandler box for reuse.
locationWien1100.section4Body: Favoriten is more than concrete. The extensive green areas on Laaer Berg and in Oberlaa are home to numerous single-family houses and allotments. When clearing such properties we handle not only the house but also sheds, garages and gardens. In stark contrast are the modern penthouses and apartments in Wienerberg City. Here especially careful handling of high-quality materials and designer furniture is required. We protect sensitive surfaces and work with maximum discretion to respect residents’ privacy, whether cellars or attics.

locationWien1110.section1Title: Household clearance in Simmering: Where industry meets idyll
locationWien1110.section1Body: Simmering, the 11th district, is a district of contrasts. Here vast industrial areas and the busy Alberner Hafen meet quiet single-family settlements and the idyllic allotments on Leberberg. This variety is reflected in the requirements for household clearance. Whether clearing a huge workshop hall or dissolving a small terraced house – we have the right solution. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1110.section2Body: Simmering is one of Vienna’s largest districts by area and home to numerous large housing estates and extensive industrial sites. Efficient logistics is the key to success here. We specialise in removing even large quantities of bulky waste and rubble quickly and properly. Through the use of containers and close cooperation with local operators we keep costs down and environmental impact as low as possible.
locationWien1110.section3Body: A major advantage for household clearances in Simmering is the excellent infrastructure. The district has its own generously sized MA48 facility at Johann-Petrak-Gasse 1. This enables short transport routes and fast, eco-friendly disposal of bulky waste, rubble and hazardous materials. At all facilities well-preserved items can be handed in at the 48er-Tandler box for reuse, reducing the waste mountain.
locationWien1110.section4Title: Unique living worlds: From the Gasometers to Zentralfriedhof
locationWien1110.section4Body: A special challenge and at the same time a landmark of the district are the Gasometers. Clearing a flat in these listed buildings requires not only careful planning but also particularly gentle handling of the unique architecture. In contrast are the numerous single-family houses and allotments, where clearance often has to include gardens, sheds and summer houses. We handle storage halls and workshops as well as estates, where proximity to Zentralfriedhof – one of Europe’s largest cemeteries – demands a particularly high degree of sensitivity and discretion.

locationWien1110.faq3Q: Access to my house is very narrow. Is that a problem?
locationWien1110.faq3A: No, we are prepared for all eventualities. We use agile vehicles as needed or arrange temporary no-parking zones.

locationWien1120.section1Title: Household clearance in Meidling: Flexible and reliable
locationWien1120.section1Body: Meidling, the 12th district, is a district of variety. Here the bustling life around Meidlinger Hauptstraße meets the quiet, almost village-like settlements in Hetzendorf. This mix of urban flair and green oasis places varied demands on household clearance. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1120.section2Body: As an important transport hub with Meidling station, the 12th district is well connected but also heavily trafficked. We know the best times and routes to avoid congestion and clear your flat or business quickly and efficiently. In the narrow streets of the old neighbourhoods we arrange no-parking zones when needed, while in large housing estates like „Am Schöpfwerk“ we rely on our established procedures and good cooperation with property management.
locationWien1120.section3Body: A decisive advantage for clearances in Meidling is the district’s own MA48 facility in Hetzendorf (Wundtgasse/Jägerhausgasse). This local drop-off point enables fast, eco-friendly disposal of bulky waste and recyclables, saving time and cost. For well-preserved furniture and items too good to throw away, a 48er-Tandler box is available at the facility to promote reuse.
locationWien1120.section4Title: From Gründerzeit flat to business park
locationWien1120.section4Body: Meidling offers a wide range of property types. The grand tenement buildings along Wienzeile require careful handling of historic fabric. In contrast are the modern office complexes such as Business Park Vienna or Euro Plaza. When clearing business premises here, discretion and compliance with strict internal rules are paramount. Whether a small flat in one of the many municipal buildings, a single-family house with garden in Altmannsdorf or an entire office – we have the right solution for every challenge and guarantee a professional, stress-free process.

locationWien1130.section1Title: Premium service for Hietzing: Where elegance meets care
locationWien1130.section1Body: Hietzing, the 13th district, is a byword for exclusivity and quality of life. Shaped by grand villas, extensive gardens and the imperial neighbourhood of Schönbrunn Palace, household clearance here demands the highest standards of care, discretion and professionalism. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1130.section2Body: In Hietzing it is not just about clearing a house. It is about preserving a heritage. Our teams are trained to protect the valuable fabric of historic villas. We work with special coverings for sensitive parquet and marble floors, protect ornate stairwells and use shoe covers so as not to leave any trace. Equally important to us is protecting the often lovingly tended gardens. We ensure that clearance does not damage beds or lawns and leave the property in perfect condition.
locationWien1130.section3Body: As Hietzing has no MA48 facility of its own, thoughtful logistics are essential. The nearest and most convenient option is the facility in Auhof (Wientalstraße 51, 1140 Vienna). For residents in the southern parts of Hietzing the facility in Liesing (Seybelgasse 7, 1230 Vienna) can also be a good alternative. We take care of the full planning and execution of disposal runs to save you time and effort.
locationWien1130.section4Title: A partner for the highest demands
locationWien1130.section4Body: Clearing a household in Hietzing is often linked to valuing a valuable estate. Our experts for art and antiques produce sound valuations and work with renowned auction houses to ensure you achieve the best price for your valuables. We understand that behind every object there is a story and treat each item with the respect it deserves. From the first inspection of garden houses and garages to the final handover of complete estates, you have a personal contact who takes care of all your concerns and ensures a smooth, stress-free process.

locationWien1130.whatPoint2: Flats in elegant tenement buildings near Schönbrunn Palace
locationWien1130.whatPoint3: Outbuildings such as garden houses, garages and studios

locationWien1130.faq1A: Our vehicles are neutral and our teams are extremely discreet. Communication is exclusively through a contact person you designate.
locationWien1130.faq2Q: I live abroad and have inherited a villa in Hietzing. How can you help?
locationWien1130.faq2A: We specialise in supporting international heirs. We arrange video inspections and send you all protocols and documents digitally.
locationWien1130.faq3Q: What happens to my grandmother's valuable porcelain?
locationWien1130.faq3A: We have valuable pieces valued by experts and credit you fairly. On request we also arrange insured transport to an auction house.

locationWien1140.section1Title: Household clearance in Penzing: Between urban life and Wienerwald
locationWien1140.section1Body: Penzing, the 14th district, is a district of contrasts. It stretches from the lively Gürtel to the green fringes of the Wienerwald. This mix of urban bustle and natural idyll is reflected in the properties and places special demands on household clearance. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1140.section2Body: Penzing's geographical variety requires flexible, thoughtful logistics. In the densely built areas around Hütteldorfer Straße and Johnstraße careful planning of no-parking zones and loading times is essential. In the villa quarters of Hütteldorf or on Wolfersberg it is often the steep slopes and narrow access that pose a special challenge. Our teams know these conditions well and use special equipment such as winches or smaller, agile vehicles when needed to reach every property safely and efficiently.
locationWien1140.section3Title: Practical and close: Disposal in Auhof
locationWien1140.section3Body: A major advantage for Penzing residents is the district's own MA48 facility in Auhof (Wientalstraße 51). This well-accessible local drop-off point makes disposal of bulky waste and recyclables particularly efficient and eco-friendly. Short distances save time and money. The 48er-Tandler box on site also promotes reuse of well-preserved items and thus sustainability.
locationWien1140.section4Body: The architecture in Penzing is as varied as the district itself. From Otto Wagner's magnificent villas to the large municipal buildings in Breitensee – every property has its own character. When clearing a historic villa we place the highest value on protecting the fabric and careful handling of valuable interiors. In the large housing estates, by contrast, efficiency and good coordination with property management are key. Whether a single-family house with large garden, an artist's studio, workshops, studios and storage halls or a small flat with loft – we have the right solution for every requirement and ensure a professional, stress-free process.

locationWien1150.section1Title: Household clearance in Rudolfsheim-Fünfhaus: Urban, dynamic, efficient
locationWien1150.section1Body: Rudolfsheim-Fünfhaus, the 15th district, is a pulsating, multicultural hotspot. Shaped by its proximity to Westbahnhof, the Wiener Stadthalle and the lively outer Mariahilfer Straße, there is always something going on here. A household clearance in this dynamic environment requires above all one thing: fast, flexible and perfectly organised logistics. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1150.section2Title: Logistics in the heart of the west
locationWien1150.section2Body: The 15th district is one of Vienna's most densely populated. The countless Gründerzeit buildings often have narrow stairwells and no lifts. Our teams specialise in working efficiently and with care for materials even on the top floors. Parking, especially near Westbahnhof and the Stadthalle, is a constant challenge. We get around this with precise scheduling, application for no-parking zones and the use of agile, city-optimised vehicles.
locationWien1150.section3Body: Although the 15th district has no MA48 facility of its own, its central location gives it excellent links to the disposal infrastructure of neighbouring districts. The nearest facilities are in Auhof (Wientalstraße 51, 1140 Vienna) and Hernals (Richthausenstraße 2, 1170 Vienna). For well-preserved items the nearby 48er-Tandler in the 5th district is also a sustainable alternative to promote reuse.
locationWien1150.section4Body: Rudolfsheim-Fünfhaus has changed greatly in recent years. Alongside the classic tenement buildings there are more and more modernised flats often used for short-term lets (Airbnb). We offer special services for landlords and carry out clearances and cleaning in the short windows between two bookings. Whether a small investor flat, a shop in Sechshauser Straße, clearing storage units or an estate in one of the quieter neighbourhoods – we work quickly, discreetly and hand over every property broom-clean and ready for the future.

locationWien1160.section1Title: Household clearance in Ottakring: Between urban flair and green lung
locationWien1160.section1Body: Ottakring, the 16th district, is a district of variety and joie de vivre. From the pulsating life at Brunnenmarkt and Yppenplatz via the traditional tenement buildings to the elegant villas on Wilhelminenberg – Ottakring combines the best of two worlds. This variety requires a flexible approach adapted to local conditions for every household clearance. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1160.section2Title: Logistics in the heart of the west
locationWien1160.section2Body: The busy activity around Brunnenmarkt, one of Europe's longest street markets, poses a special logistical challenge. We know the best times for deliveries and removals and arrange no-parking zones when needed so as not to disrupt market operations. In the densely built areas of inner Ottakring the stairwells are often narrow and without lifts. Our experienced teams master these hurdles with strength and nous. In the villa quarter on Wilhelminenberg it is the steep slopes that require special planning. We are prepared for all eventualities and guarantee a smooth process.
locationWien1160.section3Body: Ottakring has no MA48 facility of its own. The nearest and most practical drop-off point for proper disposal of bulky waste and recyclables is the facility in Hernals (Richthausenstraße 2, 1170 Vienna). For residents in the western parts of Ottakring the facility in Auhof (Wientalstraße 51, 1140 Vienna) is also a well-accessible alternative. We plan disposal routes efficiently to save time and cost.
locationWien1160.section4Title: A district with history and future
locationWien1160.section4Body: Ottakring has a long history as a workers' and industrial district. Many former factory floors and courtyard workshops are now used as studios, lofts or start-up offices. When clearing such properties, as well as production and workshop space, we bring our know-how in handling heavy machinery and special materials. At the same time Ottakring is a district that is constantly evolving. Whether dissolving a traditional flat, clearing a modern penthouse with a view over the city or clearing an allotment in Neuwaldegg – we work quickly, professionally and with the respect due to the history and people of this unique district.

locationWien1190.section1Title: Household clearance in Döbling: Exclusivity requires expertise
locationWien1190.section1Body: Vienna's 19th district Döbling is a symbol of elegance and lifestyle. From the world-famous wine taverns (Heurigen) in Grinzing and Sievering to magnificent villas on Kahlenberg and the monumental Karl-Marx-Hof, Döbling turns apparent contrasts into a harmonious whole. In this exclusive environment household clearance demands the highest professionalism, discretion and expertise. As part of our clearance or cleaning services we only assess the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand items – we do not purchase them separately.
locationWien1190.section2Body: The picturesque but often steep and narrow paths in the vineyards pose a unique logistical challenge. Our teams specialise in clearing even the hardest-to-reach villas and winegrowers' houses safely and efficiently. We plan our approach meticulously, use special vehicles or inclined lifts when needed and work in close cooperation with local residents so as not to disturb the peaceful atmosphere of the wine district. Protecting valuable gardens, mature trees and dry stone walls is always our top priority.
locationWien1190.section3Body: A major advantage for Döbling is the MA48 waste facility in Heiligenstadt (Grinzinger Straße 151). This local facility allows bulky waste, green waste and other recyclables to be disposed of quickly and in an eco-friendly way right in the district. This not only saves time but also avoids long transport routes across the city. The MA48 second-hand box on site offers well-preserved items a meaningful second life.
locationWien1190.section4Body: Villas and large flats in Döbling often harbour real treasures: from valuable art collections to antique furniture and fine wine cellars. Our valuation experts have the expertise to identify and fairly assess these assets. We work closely with auction houses and collectors to achieve the best possible return for you. Clearing a flat in the Karl-Marx-Hof – one of the longest residential buildings in the world – on the other hand requires above all efficiency and close coordination with property management. We approach both with the same professionalism and dedication.
locationWien1190.whatPoint1: Wine tavern houses and villas in Grinzing, Sievering and Neustift am Walde.
locationWien1190.whatPoint2: Flats in the historic Karl-Marx-Hof in Heiligenstadt.
locationWien1190.whatPoint3: Garages, wine cellars and wine presses in the vineyards.
locationWien1190.whatPoint4: Loft and terrace flats with city views.

locationWien1190.step2Desc: Our experts value wine stocks, extensive collections or valuable artworks.
locationWien1190.step3Desc: For steep or hard-to-reach locations we use smaller carriers, inclined lifts or cranes when required.
locationWien1190.step4Desc: We hand over the property in immaculate condition; on request including light garden maintenance for the perfect first impression.
locationWien1190.faq1Q: Can you clear an entire wine cellar?
locationWien1190.faq1A: Yes, we have experience in classifying and documenting wine storage and can arrange recognised wine experts or buyers if required.
locationWien1190.faq2Q: Are there extra costs for extremely steep locations in Grinzing?
locationWien1190.faq2A: No, we include the extra effort required for such locations transparently in our fixed-price quote from the outset.
locationWien1190.faq3Q: How discreet can you be when clearing a grand villa?
locationWien1190.faq3A: Discretion is our top priority. Our vehicles are unmarked, our staff are bound by confidentiality agreements and we can work outside normal business hours on request.

locationWien1210.section1Title: Household clearance in Floridsdorf: Vision for large areas
locationWien1210.section1Body: Floridsdorf, the 21st district, is one of Vienna's largest and most diverse districts by area. From the urban centres around Floridsdorfer Spitz via huge municipal housing estates like Großfeldsiedlung to rural wine tavern villages like Stammersdorf at the foot of Bisamberg – worlds meet here. Household clearance in this sprawling district requires above all one thing: excellent planning and adaptable logistics. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1210.section2Body: Floridsdorf's size places special demands on logistics. We plan our routes efficiently to save time and costs. In densely built-up areas we organise no-parking zones when needed, while in the rural parts of the district we also work safely on unpaved roads and in narrow lanes. When clearing large single-family homes, farms or commercial sites we use containers to remove large quantities of bulky waste and rubble quickly and in an eco-friendly way.
locationWien1210.section3Title: Two waste facilities for short distances
locationWien1210.section3Body: A major advantage in Floridsdorf is the excellent waste infrastructure. With two MA48 facilities in Stammersdorf (Nikolsburger Gasse 12) and Donaufeld (Fultonstraße 10), the district has two central drop-off points. This guarantees short transport routes and fast, eco-friendly disposal wherever you live in the district. The 48er-Tandler boxes at both sites also promote the reuse of well-preserved items.
locationWien1210.section4Title: A district for all walks of life
locationWien1210.section4Body: The variety of properties in Floridsdorf is impressive. Whether clearing a small flat in one of the many municipal housing blocks, emptying a single-family house with a large garden in Jedlesee or clearing a wine cellar in Stammersdorf – we have the right solution for every situation. We know the specifics of large housing estates and work closely with property management. At the same time we have the expertise to fairly assess agricultural equipment, tools or even entire vehicle fleets and find new uses for them, including for business parks, storage facilities and car workshops.

locationWien1200.section1Title: Household clearance in Brigittenau: Dynamics between Danube and Danube Canal
locationWien1200.section1Body: Brigittenau, the 20th district, is a district in transition. Located on an island between the Danube and the Danube Canal, the former working-class area has developed into a lively, multicultural neighbourhood with modern residential and office complexes. Household clearance in this dynamic environment requires flexible and adaptable logistics. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1200.section2Body: Brigittenau is characterised by high population density and a mix of Gründerzeit buildings, large municipal housing estates and modern high-rises. We are experts in the particular challenges this mix brings. In the new residential areas along the Danube, such as Handelskai, we know the logistics of high-rises with their loading zones and freight lifts. In the traditional, densely built areas around Wallensteinplatz and Hannovermarkt we organise no-parking zones when needed to ensure smooth execution.
locationWien1200.section3Body: Brigittenau has no MA48 waste facility of its own. Due to its central location between the districts of Döbling and Floridsdorf, disposal routes are short. The nearest facilities are in Heiligenstadt (Grinzinger Straße 151, 1190 Vienna) and Donaufeld (Fultonstraße 10, 1210 Vienna). We plan routes optimally for fast, eco-friendly disposal.
locationWien1200.section4Body: From dissolving a modern office in Millennium City to clearing a small flat in one of the many municipal housing blocks – requirements in the 20th district are diverse. We offer the right solution for every situation. When dissolving investor flats or serviced apartments we work quickly and discreetly to minimise vacancy. In large housing estates we coordinate closely with property management to protect common areas and disturb neighbours as little as possible. We are your reliable partner for professional, stress-free household clearance in Brigittenau, including clearing cellars and storage areas.

locationWien1220.section1Title: Household clearance in Donaustadt: Vision for Vienna's largest district
locationWien1220.section1Body: Donaustadt, the 22nd district, is a district of superlatives: the largest, the greenest and one of Vienna's fastest-growing areas. From the skyscrapers of Donau City via innovative housing projects in Seestadt Aspern to idyllic single-family settlements and the unspoilt landscapes of the Lobau – the variety is enormous. Household clearance in this vast district requires flexible and forward-looking planning. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1220.section2Body: The sheer size of Donaustadt places special demands on logistics. Our teams know the fastest routes and best times to avoid traffic. We specialise in clearing single-family homes with large gardens as well as dissolving flats in the high-rises around Donauzentrum. Through the use of large vehicles and containers and close cooperation with nearby MA 48 recycling centres we work particularly efficiently and cost-effectively.
locationWien1220.section3Body: Donaustadt offers excellent infrastructure for proper disposal with two MA48 facilities in Stadlau (Mühlwasserstraße 2) and at Rinterzelt (Percostraße 4). This decentralised setup ensures short travel distances across the district and enables fast, eco-friendly handling. Both sites also have 48er-Tandler boxes where well-preserved items can be handed in for reuse.
locationWien1220.section4Body: Whether clearing a modern loft in Seestadt, dissolving an allotment garden on the Alte Donau or clearing an old farm in Essling – we have the right solution for every challenge. We know the specifics of modern housing complexes and coordinate closely with property management. At the same time we have the expertise and equipment to clear gardens, sheds, pools and even small bathing huts properly, as well as clearing cellars. We are your reliable partner for professional, stress-free household clearance in all parts of Donaustadt.

locationWien1230.section1Title: Household clearance in Liesing: Where industry meets idyll
locationWien1230.section1Body: Liesing, the 23rd district, is a district of variety stretching from the edge of the Vienna Woods to the southern city limit. Here, sprawling industrial areas meet charming old village centres, modern terraced estates meet idyllic vineyards. This mix of urbanity, industry and rural character places very particular demands on household clearance. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationWien1230.section2Body: Liesing is a district of large areas. The extensive commercial zones in Inzersdorf and along Triester Straße require professional logistics for clearing large warehouses, production sites and office complexes. We specialise in disposing of heavy machinery and large volumes of material efficiently and properly. In contrast are the winding lanes in the old centres of Mauer or Rodaun. There we use agile vehicles and careful planning to preserve historic fabric and village character.
locationWien1230.section3Body: Liesing offers optimal infrastructure for proper disposal with two MA48 facilities in Inzersdorf (Südrandstraße 2) and Liesing (Seybelgasse 7). This decentralised coverage keeps distances short across the district, saving time and protecting the environment. Both sites also have 48er-Tandler boxes for handing in well-preserved items for reuse.
locationWien1230.section4Title: Unique living environments: From Alterlaa to the vineyards
locationWien1230.section4Body: An architectural highlight of the district is Wohnpark Alterlaa, one of Austria’s largest housing estates. Clearing a flat in these terrace blocks requires specific know-how and close coordination with property management. We are equally at home in the many single-family and terraced housing estates, where we look after not only the house but also gardens, garages and cellars. In the wine-growing areas of Mauer and Kalksburg we bring our expertise in dissolving wine taverns and valuing wine cellars. We are your competent partner for every type of household clearance in the diverse 23rd district, including business parks, offices and production halls.

locationKlosterneuburg.section1Body: Klosterneuburg, the „town at the gates of Vienna“, is a place of particular elegance and historical significance. Shaped by the imposing Klosterneuburg Abbey, the magnificent villas in the vineyards and the picturesque setting on the Danube, clearance here demands the highest standards of professionalism, care and discretion. Our clearance service in Klosterneuburg covers villas, wine cellars and period flats alike. We only factor in the value of antiques, furniture and second-hand goods as part of our clearances or removals – no separate purchase.
locationKlosterneuburg.section2Body: The topography of Klosterneuburg with its steep slopes and narrow lanes requires sophisticated logistics. Many of the exclusive villas in Weidling or on the Ölberg are hard to reach. Our teams specialise in working efficiently and safely even under the most difficult conditions. We plan access down to the last detail, use special vehicles or inclined lifts when needed and coordinate closely with the municipality to obtain the necessary permits. Protecting valuable gardens and historic fabric is our top priority.
locationKlosterneuburg.section3Body: The villas and grand bourgeois households in Klosterneuburg often harbour significant values – from extensive libraries to art collections and fine wine cellars. Our experts have the specialist knowledge to identify these values and ensure a fair allowance. We work with a network of specialists, from art historians to wine experts, to achieve the best possible result for you. Whether dissolving a representative villa, clearing a flat with a view of the Danube or clearing an old wine tavern or studios and workshops – we are your reliable and discreet partner in Klosterneuburg.
locationKlosterneuburg.section4Title: Sustainable disposal at Klosterneuburg recycling centre
locationKlosterneuburg.section4Body: An important part of our service is environmentally sound and proper disposal. Klosterneuburg operates a modern, well-organised recycling centre in Inkustraße, which serves as the central drop-off point for all types of recyclables. Here we can dispose of bulky waste, rubble, electrical equipment and green waste quickly and in line with local regulations. For companies carrying out household clearance, a delivery confirmation is required – a formality we take care of. Using this local facility allows us to keep transport distances short and optimise disposal costs for you while contributing to the high quality of life in the town.
