ueberblick.heroSubtitle: Complete overview of household clearance in Vienna: costs, process, value adjustment & broom-clean handover. All 23 districts with MA48 connection!
ueberblick.introTitle: Household clearance Vienna: Your complete overview
ueberblick.intro: We support household clearances in Vienna, Lower Austria and Burgenland; the examples in this overview show the specifics of the capital. Whether move, death or simple clearance – this guide walks you through all key aspects, from costs and process to value adjustment.
ueberblick.costTip: Value adjustment can significantly reduce your household clearance cost or even make it free!
ueberblick.districtsTitle: Household clearance in all Vienna districts
ueberblick.districtsIntro: As a household clearance company in Vienna we are active in all 23 districts:
ueberblick.districtsCenterAdvantage: Short distance to MA48 waste sites
ueberblick.ma48Intro: 21 MA48 waste sites in Vienna. As a household clearance company in Vienna we use this dense network:
ueberblick.tandlerNote: Important for value adjustment: 48er-Tandler boxes in each district allow free disposal of well-preserved items.
ueberblick.processStep1Desc: Phone discussion (15–30 min). First cost estimate based on photos/video. Arrange inspection appointment.
ueberblick.processStep2Desc: On-site assessment of all premises. Inventory of valuable items. Logistics planning for access and disposal. Written fixed-price quote.
ueberblick.processStep3Desc: Systematic room-by-room clearance. Value adjustment for reusable items. Environmentally sound disposal via MA48 network. Documentation for insurance/property management.
ueberblick.processStep4Desc: Basic cleaning of all rooms. Photo protocol of work done. Written acceptance and handover document.
ueberblick.valuationFurnitureItems: Antique and designer furniture, solid wood furniture and kitchens, sofas, beds, wardrobes
ueberblick.valuationArtItems: Paintings and sculptures, porcelain and ceramics, watches and jewellery
ueberblick.valuationBooksItems: Academic libraries, rare editions and first prints, coins and stamps
ueberblick.valuationTechItems: Working electronics, computers and phones, household appliances
ueberblick.valuationHow4: Cash payment at start of clearance
ueberblick.legalInsuranceDesc: Comprehensive insurance for all work. Liability for damage to neighbouring properties. Documentation for insurance cases.
ueberblick.legalDocsDesc: Photo protocol before and after clearance. Inventory lists for valuable items. Disposal certificates for hazardous waste.
ueberblick.legalDiscretionDesc: Neutral vehicles without company branding. Staff confidentiality for sensitive clearances. Discreet scheduling including weekends.
ueberblick.faqTitle: Frequently asked questions about household clearance Vienna
ueberblick.faq1Q: What does household clearance in Vienna cost?
ueberblick.faq1A: Depending on size and condition: rooms from 150 €, 2-room flat 250–400 €, large flat 400–800 €, detached house 600–1,200 €. After inspection you receive a concrete fixed price.
ueberblick.faq2A: We assess antiques, furniture, art and valuables directly on site. The value is deducted from the fixed price – often making your household clearance much cheaper.
ueberblick.faq3Q: Which Vienna districts do you cover?
ueberblick.faq3A: All 23 Vienna districts from the inner city (1st) to the outer districts (23rd). We know local specifics and disposal points in each district.
ueberblick.faq4Q: How quickly can a household clearance be done?
ueberblick.faq4A: Appointments are usually available within 2–3 working days. Small flats are often cleared the same day, larger properties need 1–2 days.
ueberblick.faq5A: We dispose of bulky waste in an environmentally sound way at Vienna MA48 waste sites. For well-preserved items we use 48er-Tandler boxes for reuse.
ueberblick.ctaTagline: Free consultation for all Vienna districts.
ueberblick.ctaSubline: As one of Vienna’s leading household clearance companies we offer transparency, fairness and professionalism on every project.
